name: Poring Garland [1]
description: "Hey guys, have you heard? The long-awaited Poring Island National Wildlife Park has been opened to the public!" "Wow! Really?! Ms. Anna has always loved Poring in all its colors! It seems that this date is stable. Hahahaha….", "Oh…What is your kid on about? I cursed you on the day you met Ghostring?!!!" "…You, do you plan on dying! " (The noise rang through the lounge of the entire adventure guild... and it seemed to be a little better...)

name: Poring Growth Panacea
description: Poring Kingdom Secret Potion Gain double Base and Job Exp from killing monsters for 1 hour after use!

name: Poring Hat
description: Hat designed based the look of the popular monster, Poring. The material is certainly not stuffy rubber!

name: Poring Hat Blueprint
description: Hat designed based the look of the popular monster, Poring. The material is certainly not stuffy rubber!

name: Poring Hat [1]
description: Hat designed based the look of the popular monster, Poring. The material is certainly not stuffy rubber!

name: Poring Holiday Lucky Bag
description: Special holiday lucky bag from Poring Kingdom!  Open to get: 5x Poring Medal, 50x Adventure Meatball, 1x Praying Card Pack and randomly 20-100x Nibelungen Shard

name: Poring Party Gift Box
description: Party Gift Box given by Poring Kingdom Open to get 3 x Big Cat Voucher I and one of the following items randomly: 1 x Transparent Wing Blueprint, 1 x Seed of Mastela, 1 x Gold Medal, 1 x Mora Coin, 1 x Praying Card Pack

name: Poring Schoolbag
effect: Def ＋15,When Refining ＋10 and Luck reaches 90, Crit.Dmg ＋5%

name: Poring Trumpeter [1]
description: What are you waiting for? Let's join this music feast!

name: Port Picnic Pac
description: A picnic pad with the style and design of the port. You can almost feel the enthusiasm of the sea when using it.

name: Portable Deviruchi
description: Every time the adventurer wants to get up, the little guy reminds the adventurer to sleep for ten more minutes. Well, it might be the wrong choice to take it along.

name: Portable Deviruchi Blueprint
description: Every time the adventurer wants to get up, the little guy reminds the adventurer to sleep for ten more minutes. Well, it might be the wrong choice to take it along.

name: Power of Thor
description: Win-style accessory that condenses the wind power.

name: Power Of Thor Blueprint
description: Win-style accessory that condenses the wind power.

name: Powerful Ring
description: The ring with flashing light, anyone approaching it would feel the surging power. It is said to be the masterpiece of the jeweler, Andre.

name: Powerful Ring[1]
description: The ring with flashing light, anyone approaching it would feel the surging power. It is said to be the masterpiece of the jeweler, Andre.
